live in. After 21 years of organizing
Nguyen Hue flower street, it has become a feature and
pride of the city's people.
Every spring in Ho Chi Minh City, the
2024 Tet Flower Street will open on the evening of
October 7, the 28th day of the Lunar New Year. Construction work
is being carried out urgently and
this year's mascot, the pair of dragons flanking the lotus, has
revealed its highlight at the festival.  The welcoming gate of Hoang
Nguyen Hue Street is a pair of dragon mascots, each
dragon has five body segments along both
sides of the flower path, more than 100 meters long and the head is
about 2 meters large. In addition to setting a record for the size of the
dragon mascot this year, it also sets a record for the size of the dragon mascot this year.
Designed to be environmentally friendly
with more than 90% bamboo material and fan
blinds, the fan blinds under the
dragon's belly will move when there is wind, creating a
vivid image like a dragon
sighing over 600 meters of flower road.  Nguyen Hue Lunar
New Year 2024 includes three segments with the
theme of homeland roots
crossing rivers and seas and embracing integration. In addition to
mascots, the flower street is also
decorated with more than 90,000 flower shells of all kinds with
three main colors:  Red, orange, yellow of
flowers such as carnations, geraniums,
dahlias, chicken colors, begonias,
Nguyen Hue flower street will be open to visitors
from 7:00 p.m. on the 28th of the Lunar New Year until 9:00 p.m. on the 14th of the first lunar month.

Tet. Doctors at Tu Du Hospital and
Children's Hospital 1 in Ho Chi Minh City
have just successfully performed a special hat to
welcome a 2.9 kg baby boy born on
January 30. This is  The first case of cardiac bypass surgery
in Vietnam,
about 15 doctors performed a cesarean section on the
mother at 37 weeks of pregnancy. The baby cried loudly and
did not require oxygen as predicted, as
recorded by an echocardiogram right in the operating room.  The
blood flow through the narrowed area was good.
About a month ago, the doctors
performed a cardiac catheterization in the mother's womb.
Initial assessment until today, as
you can see, we were
successful and damn you.  The doctor who intervened the
other day was really very emotional.
Today, he is back to being
almost a paralyzed child. He is currently
being cared for and monitored at
Children's Hospital 1 in Ho Chi Minh City. It is
clear that he is suffering.  To save the baby from a
danger, we have to proceed according to the
story of me intervening and the
remaining interior direction. This baby's plan
must be specific: 24 hours, then 36 hours, 72
hours, I will have an ultrasound to check again.  There will be
a very specific plan with the
family, a successful surgery will be the
premise for the next fetal heart intervention cases

A unique drone demonstration program
recently took place
in the Victoria Harbor area of ​​Hong Kong,
China, bringing excitement to residents
and visitors of the program as part of an
event called Colors of Hong Kong.
For the upcoming Lunar New Year,
drones have created
images such as Ocean Park,
Victoria Harbor's skyline,
Neon signs, Opera dancers,
Dragons flying in the night sky in
Victoria Harbor.  Beautiful and sophisticated images
with bright colors help viewers
fully experience the combination of
traditional culture and modern technology,
especially when at the end of the
light show a Q code appears on the screen.
outside Victoria Harbor, visitors can
scan this Q code to learn about
locations in Hong Kong and have the opportunity to receive
discount coupons for exhibitions and performances.

Thousands of people participated in torchlighting at
the fire festival in the Shetland Islands. Scotland
has been preserved and passed down for more than 140 years.
This is considered one of the most
Europe's largest fire festival brings the
traditional cultural values ​​of the
Vikings. This traditional event is
held on the last Tuesday of
January every year with many activities such as singing
parades.  singing, dancing and carrying torches, the
characters playing the role of Viking soldiers are
divided into many teams, each team is led by a
leader called the leader. After the parade, the
teams gather in a circle next to the
warship to simulate singing
traditional songs.  The president then simultaneously set fire to
the ship. The burned ship imitated
the warship of the
ancient Vikings after the ship was reduced to a pile of
ashes. This is the time when the people of
Scotland enjoy the activities. They
enjoy  drinking and dancing until the
next morning the next day is also an
official national holiday

animals can help lower blood pressure, reduce headaches
and the risk of cardiovascular disease. It also
increases the feeling of happiness and helps children.
People cope better with stress.
There is growing evidence that

people's mental and physical health.
